name: Quality Assessment of Final Root Canal Treatment Using Intra-Oral Periapical Radiographs
description: This study addresses dental practice's challenge of evaluating root canal treatment quality. Current evaluation depends on subjective dentist judgment, lacking standardized criteria. Developing an AI-based method using deep learning to automate and standardize the evaluation process.

name: Automated Medical Image Annotation for Dataset Building
description: Developing automated tools for medical image annotation to accelerate dataset building for AI/ML applications in healthcare. This project focuses on creating efficient annotation workflows that reduce manual effort while maintaining high accuracy.

name: GPU Acceleration for Deep Learning based Comprehensive ECG Analysis
description: Developing a GPU accelerated Deep Learning algorithm for ECG analysis which works like the MUSE ECG system. The project aims to create an open-source, portable, and low-power GPU alternative capable of providing comprehensive ECG analysis.

name: Using AI in Determining Alveolar Bone Loss in Dental X-rays to Aid in Periodontal Diagnosis
description: Developing an AI-based system to automatically detect and measure alveolar bone loss in dental X-rays, aiding dentists in periodontal disease diagnosis. The system aims to provide objective, standardized measurements for better treatment planning.

name: Comprehensive ECG Analysis with Deep Learning on GPU Accelerators
description: Developing a GPU accelerated Deep Learning algorithm for comprehensive ECG analysis similar to MUSE ECG system. Optimizing it as an open-source, portable, and low-power GPU alternative capable of providing comprehensive cardiac analysis.

name: Enhancing Video Game Experience With Brain Computer Interface
description: Developing a video game interface that uses brain-computer interface (BCI) based on electroencephalography (EEG). The system allows users to control video games using their brain signals, creating an immersive gaming experience.

name: Human-Animal Emotion Detection Using ECG and ML Techniques
description: This project aims to improve emotion detection in humans by building a comprehensive ECG dataset and exploring animal emotion detection using similar techniques. The research contributes to understanding emotional responses across species.

name: Brain-Computer Interface for Controlling Virtual Objects
description: Developing a Brain-Computer Interface for controlling virtual objects using self-paced mind intent. The project implements a real-time pipeline for recognizing thought patterns using machine learning techniques and feeds into Unity engine for controlling virtual objects.

name: Hand Gesture Recognition using sEMG
description: Recognizing hand gestures for machine interface interaction using sEMG signals generated by muscle activations from forearm contraction. Building a model that could be used in real-time environments for gesture-based control systems.

name: Real-Time Emotion Recognition using Electrocardiogram Analysis
description: Implementing a real-time model to recognize an extended range of emotions with higher accuracy using ECG signals. The project captures sudden and complex emotional changes in humans and explores similarities and differences between human and animal emotion recognition.

name: Near-Infrared Spectroscopy for Vein Visualization
description: Using Near-Infrared spectroscopy for better vein visualization to make venipuncture more efficient. Implementing an illumination system optimized for Asian skin types while significantly reducing device cost, making it more affordable for clinical use in developing countries.

name: Vescueye - NIR Device for Microvascular Surgery
description: Developing a near-infrared (NIR) device for real-time artery detection and blood flow assessment in microvascular surgeries, especially oral and reconstructive procedures. Features cloud server integration and UI for enhanced precision and perfusion monitoring.
